uxorial: Dotingly fond of or servilely submissive to a wife uxorious also becoming a wife pertaining to a wife R The speech of Zipporah Ex iv 25 is not a speech of reproach or indignation but of uxorial endearment Geddes
uxoricidal: Of or pertaining to uxoricide tending to uxoricide
uxoricide: The murder of a wife by her husband
uxorious: Excessively fond of or submissive to a wife being a dependent husband Uxorious magistrates Milton How wouldst thou insult When I must live uxorious to thy will In perfect thraldom Milton Uxo o ri ous ly adv Ux o ri ous ness n
